name: Majestic Trials
description: Majestic Trials is a turn-based fantasy tactical game where you must compete in increasingly challenging trials to earn your place within the Majestic Citadel.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8.1 or 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 2.0 GHz or better, AMD FX-4100 or A4-4000 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Accelerated GPU with at least 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Optional
